text.ascii: vaizaMpAyana uvAca
text.ur: vaiśaṁpāyana uvāca

text.ascii: yathAgataM gate zakre bhrAtRbhiH saha saMgataH
text.ud: यथागतं गते शक्रे भ्रातृभिः सह संगतः
text.ur: yathāgataṁ gate śakre bhrātr̥bhiḥ saha saṁgataḥ

text.ascii: kRSNayA caiva bIbhatsur dharmaputram apUjayat
text.ur: kr̥ṣṇayā caiva bībhatsur dharmaputram apūjayat

text.ascii: abhivAdayamAnaM tu mUrdhny upAghrAya pANDavam
text.ur: abhivādayamānaṁ tu mūrdhny upāghrāya pāṇḍavam

text.ascii: harSagadgadayA vAcA prahRSTo 'rjunam abravIt
text.ur: harṣagadgadayā vācā prahr̥ṣṭo ’rjunam abravīt

text.ascii: katham arjuna kAlo 'yaM svarge vyatigatas tava
text.ur: katham arjuna kālo ’yaṁ svarge vyatigatas tava

text.ascii: kathaM cAstrANy avAptAni devarAjaz ca toSitaH
text.ur: kathaṁ cāstrāṇy avāptāni devarājaś ca toṣitaḥ

text.ascii: samyag vA te gRhItAni kaccid astrANi bhArata
text.ur: samyag vā te gr̥hītāni kaccid astrāṇi bhārata

text.ascii: kaccit surAdhipaH prIto rudraz cAstrANy adAt tava
text.ur: kaccit surādhipaḥ prīto rudraś cāstrāṇy adāt tava

text.ascii: yathA dRSTaz ca te zakro bhagavAn vA pinAkadhRk
text.ud: यथा दृष्टश्च ते शक्रो भगवान्वा पिनाकधृक्
text.ur: yathā dr̥ṣṭaś ca te śakro bhagavān vā pinākadhr̥k

text.ascii: yathA cAstrANy avAptAni yathA cArAdhitaz ca te
text.ur: yathā cāstrāṇy avāptāni yathā cārādhitaś ca te

text.ascii: yathoktavAMs tvAM bhagavAJ zatakratur ariMdama
text.ur: yathoktavāṁs tvāṁ bhagavāñ śatakratur ariṁdama

text.ascii: kRtapriyas tvayAsmIti tac ca te kiM priyaM kRtam
text.ud: कृतप्रियस्त्वयास्मीति तच्च ते किं प्रियं कृतम्
text.ur: kr̥tapriyas tvayāsmīti tac ca te kiṁ priyaṁ kr̥tam

text.ascii: etad icchAmy ahaM zrotuM vistareNa mahAdyute
text.ur: etad icchāmy ahaṁ śrotuṁ vistareṇa mahādyute

text.ascii: yathA tuSTo mahAdevo devarAjaz ca te 'nagha
text.ur: yathā tuṣṭo mahādevo devarājaś ca te ’nagha

text.ascii: yac cApi vajrapANes te priyaM kRtam ariMdama
text.ur: yac cāpi vajrapāṇes te priyaṁ kr̥tam ariṁdama

text.ascii: etad AkhyAhi me sarvam akhilena dhanaMjaya
text.ur: etad ākhyāhi me sarvam akhilena dhanaṁjaya

text.ascii: arjuna uvAca
text.ur: arjuna uvāca

text.ascii: zRNu hanta mahArAja vidhinA yena dRSTavAn
text.ud: शृणु हन्त महाराज विधिना येन दृष्टवान्
text.ur: śr̥ṇu hanta mahārāja vidhinā yena dr̥ṣṭavān

text.ascii: zatakratum ahaM devaM bhagavantaM ca zaMkaram
text.ur: śatakratum ahaṁ devaṁ bhagavantaṁ ca śaṁkaram

text.ascii: vidyAm adhItya tAM rAjaMs tvayoktAm arimardana
text.ur: vidyām adhītya tāṁ rājaṁs tvayoktām arimardana

text.ascii: bhavatA ca samAdiSTas tapase prasthito vanam
text.ur: bhavatā ca samādiṣṭas tapase prasthito vanam

text.ascii: bhRgutuGgam atho gatvA kAmyakAd Asthitas tapaH
text.ur: bhr̥gutuṅgam atho gatvā kāmyakād āsthitas tapaḥ

text.ascii: ekarAtroSitaH kaM cid apazyaM brAhmaNaM pathi
text.ur: ekarātroṣitaḥ kaṁ cid apaśyaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ pathi

text.ascii: sa mAm apRcchat kaunteya kvAsi gantA bravIhi me
text.ud: स मामपृच्छत्कौन्तेय क्वासि गन्ता ब्रवीहि मे
text.ur: sa mām apr̥cchat kaunteya kvāsi gantā bravīhi me

text.ascii: tasmA avitathaM sarvam abruvaM kurunandana
text.ur: tasmā avitathaṁ sarvam abruvaṁ kurunandana

text.ascii: sa tathyaM mama tac chrutvA brAhmaNo rAjasattama
text.ud: स तथ्यं मम तच्छ्रुत्वा ब्राह्मणो राजसत्तम
text.ur: sa tathyaṁ mama tac chrutvā brāhmaṇo rājasattama

text.ascii: apUjayata mAM rAjan prItimAMz cAbhavan mayi
text.ur: apūjayata māṁ rājan prītimāṁś cābhavan mayi

text.ascii: tato mAm abravIt prItas tapa AtiSTha bhArata
text.ur: tato mām abravīt prītas tapa ātiṣṭha bhārata

text.ascii: tapasvI nacireNa tvaM drakSyase vibudhAdhipam
text.ur: tapasvī nacireṇa tvaṁ drakṣyase vibudhādhipam

text.ascii: tato 'haM vacanAt tasya girim Aruhya zaiziram
text.ur: tato ’haṁ vacanāt tasya girim āruhya śaiśiram

text.ascii: tapo 'tapyaM mahArAja mAsaM mUlaphalAzanaH
text.ur: tapo ’tapyaṁ mahārāja māsaṁ mūlaphalāśanaḥ

text.ascii: dvitIyaz cApi me mAso jalaM bhakSayato gataH
text.ud: द्वितीयश्चापि मे मासो जलं भक्षयतो गतः
text.ur: dvitīyaś cāpi me māso jalaṁ bhakṣayato gataḥ

text.ascii: nirAhAras tRtIye 'tha mAse pANDavanandana
text.ur: nirāhāras tr̥tīye ’tha māse pāṇḍavanandana

text.ascii: UrdhvabAhuz caturthaM tu mAsam asmi sthitas tadA
text.ur: ūrdhvabāhuś caturthaṁ tu māsam asmi sthitas tadā

text.ascii: na ca me hIyate prANas tad adbhutam ivAbhavat
text.ur: na ca me hīyate prāṇas tad adbhutam ivābhavat

text.ascii: caturthe samabhikrAnte prathame divase gate
text.ur: caturthe samabhikrānte prathame divase gate

text.ascii: varAhasaMsthitaM bhUtaM matsamIpam upAgamat
text.ur: varāhasaṁsthitaṁ bhūtaṁ matsamīpam upāgamat

text.ascii: nighnan prothena pRthivIM vilikhaMz caraNair api
text.ur: nighnan prothena pr̥thivīṁ vilikhaṁś caraṇair api

text.ascii: saMmArjaJ jaThareNorvIM vivartaMz ca muhur muhuH
text.ur: saṁmārjañ jaṭhareṇorvīṁ vivartaṁś ca muhur muhuḥ

text.ascii: anu tasyAparaM bhUtaM mahat kairAtasaMsthitam
text.ur: anu tasyāparaṁ bhūtaṁ mahat kairātasaṁsthitam

text.ascii: dhanurbANAsimat prAptaM strIgaNAnugataM tadA
text.ur: dhanurbāṇāsimat prāptaṁ strīgaṇānugataṁ tadā

text.ascii: tato 'haM dhanur AdAya tathAkSayyau maheSudhI
text.ur: tato ’haṁ dhanur ādāya tathākṣayyau maheṣudhī

text.ascii: atADayaM zareNAtha tad bhUtaM lomaharSaNam
text.ur: atāḍayaṁ śareṇātha tad bhūtaṁ lomaharṣaṇam

text.ascii: yugapat tat kirAtaz ca vikRSya balavad dhanuH
text.ur: yugapat tat kirātaś ca vikr̥ṣya balavad dhanuḥ

text.ascii: abhyAjaghne dRDhataraM kampayann iva me manaH
text.ur: abhyājaghne dr̥ḍhataraṁ kampayann iva me manaḥ

text.ascii: sa tu mAm abravId rAjan mama pUrvaparigrahaH
text.ur: sa tu mām abravīd rājan mama pūrvaparigrahaḥ

text.ascii: mRgayAdharmam utsRjya kimarthaM tADitas tvayA
text.ur: mr̥gayādharmam utsr̥jya kimarthaṁ tāḍitas tvayā

text.ascii: eSa te nizitair bANair darpaM hanmi sthiro bhava
text.ud: एष ते निशितैर्बाणैर्दर्पं हन्मि स्थिरो भव
text.ur: eṣa te niśitair bāṇair darpaṁ hanmi sthiro bhava

text.ascii: sa varSmavAn mahAkAyas tato mAm abhyadhAvata
text.ur: sa varṣmavān mahākāyas tato mām abhyadhāvata

text.ascii: tato girim ivAtyartham AvRNon mAM mahAzaraiH
text.ur: tato girim ivātyartham āvr̥ṇon māṁ mahāśaraiḥ

text.ascii: taM cAhaM zaravarSeNa mahatA samavAkiram
text.ur: taṁ cāhaṁ śaravarṣeṇa mahatā samavākiram

text.ascii: tataH zarair dIptamukhaiH patritair anumantritaiH
text.ur: tataḥ śarair dīptamukhaiḥ patritair anumantritaiḥ

text.ascii: pratyavidhyam ahaM taM tu vajrair iva ziloccayam
text.ur: pratyavidhyam ahaṁ taṁ tu vajrair iva śiloccayam

text.ascii: tasya tac chatadhA rUpam abhavac ca sahasradhA
text.ur: tasya tac chatadhā rūpam abhavac ca sahasradhā

text.ascii: tAni cAsya zarIrANi zarair aham atADayam
text.ur: tāni cāsya śarīrāṇi śarair aham atāḍayam

text.ascii: punas tAni zarIrANi ekIbhUtAni bhArata
text.ur: punas tāni śarīrāṇi ekībhūtāni bhārata

text.ascii: adRzyanta mahArAja tAny ahaM vyadhamaM punaH
text.ur: adr̥śyanta mahārāja tāny ahaṁ vyadhamaṁ punaḥ

text.ascii: aNur bRhacchirA bhUtvA bRhac cANuzirAH punaH
text.ur: aṇur br̥hacchirā bhūtvā br̥hac cāṇuśirāḥ punaḥ

text.ascii: ekIbhUtas tadA rAjan so 'bhyavartata mAM yudhi
text.ur: ekībhūtas tadā rājan so ’bhyavartata māṁ yudhi

text.ascii: yadAbhibhavituM bANair naiva zaknomi taM raNe
text.ur: yadābhibhavituṁ bāṇair naiva śaknomi taṁ raṇe

text.ascii: tato 'ham astram AtiSThaM vAyavyaM bharatarSabha
text.ur: tato ’ham astram ātiṣṭhaṁ vāyavyaṁ bharatarṣabha

text.ascii: na cainam azakaM hantuM tad adbhutam ivAbhavat
text.ur: na cainam aśakaṁ hantuṁ tad adbhutam ivābhavat

text.ascii: tasmin pratihate cAstre vismayo me mahAn abhUt
text.ur: tasmin pratihate cāstre vismayo me mahān abhūt

text.ascii: bhUyaz caiva mahArAja savizeSam ahaM tataH
text.ur: bhūyaś caiva mahārāja saviśeṣam ahaṁ tataḥ

text.ascii: astrapUgena mahatA raNe bhUtam avAkiram
text.ur: astrapūgena mahatā raṇe bhūtam avākiram

text.ascii: sthUNAkarNam ayojAlaM zaravarSaM zarolbaNam
text.ur: sthūṇākarṇam ayojālaṁ śaravarṣaṁ śarolbaṇam

text.ascii: zailAstram azmavarSaM ca samAsthAyAham abhyayAm
text.ur: śailāstram aśmavarṣaṁ ca samāsthāyāham abhyayām

text.ascii: jagrAsa prahasaMs tAni sarvANy astrANi me 'nagha
text.ur: jagrāsa prahasaṁs tāni sarvāṇy astrāṇi me ’nagha

text.ascii: teSu sarveSu zAnteSu brahmAstram aham Adizam
text.ur: teṣu sarveṣu śānteṣu brahmāstram aham ādiśam

text.ascii: tataH prajvalitair bANaiH sarvataH sopacIyata
text.ur: tataḥ prajvalitair bāṇaiḥ sarvataḥ sopacīyata

text.ascii: upacIyamAnaz ca mayA mahAstreNa vyavardhata
text.ur: upacīyamānaś ca mayā mahāstreṇa vyavardhata

text.ascii: tataH saMtApito loko matprasUtena tejasA
text.ur: tataḥ saṁtāpito loko matprasūtena tejasā

text.ascii: kSaNena hi dizaH khaM ca sarvato 'bhividIpitam
text.ud: क्षणेन हि दिशः खं च सर्वतोऽभिविदीपितम्
text.ur: kṣaṇena hi diśaḥ khaṁ ca sarvato ’bhividīpitam

text.ascii: tad apy astraM mahAtejAH kSaNenaiva vyazAtayat
text.ur: tad apy astraṁ mahātejāḥ kṣaṇenaiva vyaśātayat

text.ascii: brahmAstre tu hate rAjan bhayaM mAM mahad Avizat
text.ud: ब्रह्मास्त्रे तु हते राजन्भयं मां महदाविशत्
text.ur: brahmāstre tu hate rājan bhayaṁ māṁ mahad āviśat

text.ascii: tato 'haM dhanur AdAya tathAkSayyau maheSudhI
text.ur: tato ’haṁ dhanur ādāya tathākṣayyau maheṣudhī

text.ascii: sahasAbhyahanaM bhUtaM tAny apy astrANy abhakSayat
text.ur: sahasābhyahanaṁ bhūtaṁ tāny apy astrāṇy abhakṣayat

text.ascii: hateSv astreSu sarveSu bhakSiteSv AyudheSu ca
text.ur: hateṣv astreṣu sarveṣu bhakṣiteṣv āyudheṣu ca

text.ascii: mama tasya ca bhUtasya bAhuyuddham avartata
text.ur: mama tasya ca bhūtasya bāhuyuddham avartata

text.ascii: vyAyAmaM muSTibhiH kRtvA talair api samAhatau
text.ur: vyāyāmaṁ muṣṭibhiḥ kr̥tvā talair api samāhatau

text.ascii: apAtayac ca tad bhUtaM nizceSTo hy agamaM mahIm
text.ur: apātayac ca tad bhūtaṁ niśceṣṭo hy agamaṁ mahīm

text.ascii: tataH prahasya tad bhUtaM tatraivAntaradhIyata
text.ur: tataḥ prahasya tad bhūtaṁ tatraivāntaradhīyata

text.ascii: saha strIbhir mahArAja pazyato me 'dbhutopamam
text.ur: saha strībhir mahārāja paśyato me ’dbhutopamam

text.ascii: evaM kRtvA sa bhagavAMs tato 'nyad rUpam AtmanaH
text.ur: evaṁ kr̥tvā sa bhagavāṁs tato ’nyad rūpam ātmanaḥ

text.ascii: divyam eva mahArAja vasAno 'dbhutam ambaram
text.ur: divyam eva mahārāja vasāno ’dbhutam ambaram

text.ascii: hitvA kirAtarUpaM ca bhagavAMs tridazezvaraH
text.ur: hitvā kirātarūpaṁ ca bhagavāṁs tridaśeśvaraḥ

text.ascii: svarUpaM divyam AsthAya tasthau tatra mahezvaraH
text.ur: svarūpaṁ divyam āsthāya tasthau tatra maheśvaraḥ

text.ascii: adRzyata tataH sAkSAd bhagavAn govRSadhvajaH
text.ur: adr̥śyata tataḥ sākṣād bhagavān govr̥ṣadhvajaḥ

text.ascii: umAsahAyo haridRg bahurUpaH pinAkadhRk
text.ur: umāsahāyo haridr̥g bahurūpaḥ pinākadhr̥k

text.ascii: sa mAm abhyetya samare tathaivAbhimukhaM sthitam
text.ur: sa mām abhyetya samare tathaivābhimukhaṁ sthitam

text.ascii: zUlapANir athovAca tuSTo 'smIti paraMtapa
text.ur: śūlapāṇir athovāca tuṣṭo ’smīti paraṁtapa

text.ascii: tatas tad dhanur AdAya tUNau cAkSayyasAyakau
text.ur: tatas tad dhanur ādāya tūṇau cākṣayyasāyakau

text.ascii: prAdAn mamaiva bhagavAn varayasveti cAbravIt
text.ur: prādān mamaiva bhagavān varayasveti cābravīt

text.ascii: tuSTo 'smi tava kaunteya brUhi kiM karavANi te
text.ud: तुष्टोऽस्मि तव कौन्तेय ब्रूहि किं करवाणि ते
text.ur: tuṣṭo ’smi tava kaunteya brūhi kiṁ karavāṇi te

text.ascii: yat te manogataM vIra tad brUhi vitarAmy aham
text.ur: yat te manogataṁ vīra tad brūhi vitarāmy aham

text.ascii: amaratvam apAhAya brUhi yat te manogatam
text.ur: amaratvam apāhāya brūhi yat te manogatam

text.ascii: tataH prAJjalir evAham astreSu gatamAnasaH
text.ur: tataḥ prāñjalir evāham astreṣu gatamānasaḥ

text.ascii: praNamya zirasA zarvaM tato vacanam Adade
text.ur: praṇamya śirasā śarvaṁ tato vacanam ādade

text.ascii: bhagavAn me prasannaz ced Ipsito 'yaM varo mama
text.ur: bhagavān me prasannaś ced īpsito ’yaṁ varo mama

text.ascii: astrANIcchAmy ahaM jJAtuM yAni deveSu kAni cit
text.ur: astrāṇīcchāmy ahaṁ jñātuṁ yāni deveṣu kāni cit

text.ascii: dadAnIty eva bhagavAn abravIt tryambakaz ca mAm
text.ur: dadānīty eva bhagavān abravīt tryambakaś ca mām

text.ascii: raudram astraM madIyaM tvAm upasthAsyati pANDava
text.ur: raudram astraṁ madīyaṁ tvām upasthāsyati pāṇḍava

text.ascii: pradadau ca mama prItaH so 'straM pAzupataM prabhuH
text.ud: प्रददौ च मम प्रीतः सोऽस्त्रं पाशुपतं प्रभुः
text.ur: pradadau ca mama prītaḥ so ’straṁ pāśupataṁ prabhuḥ

text.ascii: uvAca ca mahAdevo dattvA me 'straM sanAtanam
text.ud: उवाच च महादेवो दत्त्वा मेऽस्त्रं सनातनम्
text.ur: uvāca ca mahādevo dattvā me ’straṁ sanātanam

text.ascii: na prayojyaM bhaved etan mAnuSeSu kathaM cana
text.ur: na prayojyaṁ bhaved etan mānuṣeṣu kathaṁ cana

text.ascii: pIDyamAnena balavat prayojyaM te dhanaMjaya
text.ur: pīḍyamānena balavat prayojyaṁ te dhanaṁjaya

text.ascii: astrANAM pratighAte ca sarvathaiva prayojayeH
text.ur: astrāṇāṁ pratighāte ca sarvathaiva prayojayeḥ

text.ascii: tad apratihataM divyaM sarvAstrapratiSedhanam
text.ur: tad apratihataṁ divyaṁ sarvāstrapratiṣedhanam

text.ascii: mUrtiman me sthitaM pArzve prasanne govRSadhvaje
text.ur: mūrtiman me sthitaṁ pārśve prasanne govr̥ṣadhvaje

text.ascii: utsAdanam amitrANAM parasenAnikartanam
text.ur: utsādanam amitrāṇāṁ parasenānikartanam

text.ascii: durAsadaM duSprahasaM suradAnavarAkSasaiH
text.ur: durāsadaṁ duṣprahasaṁ suradānavarākṣasaiḥ

text.ascii: anujJAtas tv ahaM tena tatraiva samupAvizam
text.ur: anujñātas tv ahaṁ tena tatraiva samupāviśam

text.ascii: prekSataz caiva me devas tatraivAntaradhIyata
text.ur: prekṣataś caiva me devas tatraivāntaradhīyata
